verses.verse: שִׁ֥יר <WH7892> shir A Song הַֽמַּעֲל֗וֹת <WH4609> ham-ma-'a-Lot, of degrees לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <WH1732> le-Da-Vid of David לוּלֵ֣י <WH3884> lu-Lei If יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh [it had not been] the LORD שֶׁהָ֣יָה <WH1961> she-Ha-yah been לָ֑נוּ La-nu; יֹֽאמַר־ <WH559> yo-mar- say נָ֝א <WH4994> na now יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. who was on our side now may Israel

לוּלֵ֣י <WH3884> lu-Lei If יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh [it had not been] the LORD שֶׁהָ֣יָה <WH1961> she-Ha-yah been לָ֑נוּ La-nu; בְּק֖וּם <WH6965> be-Kum rose up עָלֵ֣ינוּ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-nu against אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> 'a-Dam. who was on our side when men

אֲ֭זַי <WH233> 'A-zai Then חַיִּ֣ים <WH2416> chai-Yim quick בְּלָע֑וּנוּ <WH1104> be-la-'U-nu; they had swallowed us up בַּחֲר֖וֹת <WH2734> ba-cha-Rot was kindled אַפָּ֣ם <WH639> 'ap-Pam when their wrath בָּֽנוּ׃ Ba-nu.

אֲ֭זַי <WH233> 'A-zai Then הַמַּ֣יִם <WH4325> ham-Ma-yim the waters שְׁטָפ֑וּנוּ <WH7857> she-ta-Fu-nu; had overwhelmed נַ֝֗חְלָה <WH5158> Nach-lah, us the stream עָבַ֥ר <WH5674> 'a-Var had gone over עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over נַפְשֵֽׁנוּ׃ <WH5315> naf-She-nu. our soul

אֲ֭זַי <WH233> 'A-zai Then עָבַ֣ר <WH5674> 'a-Var had gone over עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over נַפְשֵׁ֑נוּ <WH5315> naf-She-nu; our soul הַ֝מַּ֗יִם <WH4325> ham-Ma-yim, waters הַזֵּֽידוֹנִֽים׃ <WH2121> haz-Zei-do-Nim. the proud

בָּר֥וּךְ <WH1288> ba-Ruch Blessed יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; [be] the LORD שֶׁלֹּ֥א <WH3808> shel-Lo has not נְתָנָ֥נוּ <WH5414> ne-ta-Na-nu who hath not given טֶ֝֗רֶף <WH2964> Te-ref, us [as] a prey לְשִׁנֵּיהֶֽם׃ <WH8127> le-shin-nei-Hem. to their teeth

נַפְשֵׁ֗נוּ <WH5315> naf-She-nu, Our soul כְּצִפּ֥וֹר <WH6833> ke-tzip-Por as a bird נִמְלְטָה֮ <WH4422> nim-le-Tah is escaped מִפַּ֪ח <WH6341> mip-Pach out of the snare י֫וֹקְשִׁ֥ים <WH3369> yok-Shim of the fowlers הַפַּ֥ח <WH6341> hap-Pach the snare נִשְׁבָּ֗ר <WH7665> nish-Bar, is broken וַאֲנַ֥חְנוּ <WH587> va-'a-Nach-nu we נִמְלָֽטְנוּ׃ <WH4422> nim-La-te-nu. and we are escaped

עֶ֭זְרֵנוּ <WH5828> 'Ez-re-nu Our help בְּשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> be-Shem [is] in the name יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD עֹ֝שֵׂ֗ה <WH6213> 'o-Seh, who made שָׁמַ֥יִם <WH8064> sha-Ma-yim heaven וָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> va-'A-retz. and earth
